messages.subject: intentional communities was Re: oldest daughter moving back home ( Mary)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Corvallis, Oregon. But people have formed intentional communities all over the world. Ours is still very much in the planning stages, but it s starting to
messages.messageBody:
>> Wow. Mary this sounds wonderful. Where do you live?>>

Corvallis, Oregon. But people have formed intentional communities all
over the world. Ours is still very much in the planning stages, but
it's starting to seem like it may actually become a reality. We've
got family moving out here in the spring! :o)

Life is good.
~Mary

messages.subject: Re: oldest daughter moving back home ( Mary)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/24/2003 10:50:25 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Wow. Mary this sounds wonderful. Where do you live? ~Marcia [Non-text portions of this
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/24/2003 10:50:25 AM Eastern Standard Time,
zenmomma@... writes:


> My dh and I have been working towards forming an intentional
> community for years and it involves just that, many generations of
> family and friends living cooperatively with and around each other.
>

Wow. Mary this sounds wonderful. Where do you live?

~Marcia
